sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A True and perfect relation of the late and dreadful inundation which happened in Holland on Sunday Novemb. 3, 1675 at 4 of the clock afternoon, Saturn being then in opposition to Mars by which lamentable accident all the land is set under water from Amsterdam to Leyden, Utrecht, Woorden, Tergow, all South-Holland, and a great part of North-Holland, about Hoorn, &c. : together with an account of those further miseries and calamities that followed thereupon, as the drowning of men, women and children, and multitudes of cattel : as also a brief account of a dreaful storm with thunder and lightning on the same day at Antwerp and Gent, to the loss of the lives of divers porsons [sic]. Swaert, Stephen.
8 p.
[s.n.], London printed : 1675.
Imperfect: pages stained with print show-through and slight loss of print. Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
=======
A True and perfect relation of the late and dreadful inundation which happened in Holland on Sunday Novemb. 3, 1675 at 4 of the clock afternoon, Saturn being then in opposition to Mars by which lamentable accident all the land is set under water from Amsterdam to Leyden, Utrecht, Woorden, Tergow, all South-Holland, and a great part of North-Holland, about Hoorn, &c. : together with an account of those further miseries and calamities that followed thereupon, as the drowning of men, women and children, and multitudes of cattel : as also a brief account of a dreaful storm with thunder and lightning on the same day at Antwerp and Gent, to the loss of the lives of divers porsons [sic]. Swaert, Stephen.
8 p.
[s.n.], London printed : 1675.
Imperfect: pages stained with print show-through and slight loss of print. Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
